select commodity_id AS commodityId, commodity_name AS commodityName, commodity_img AS commodityImg, commodity_desc AS commodityDesc, grade AS grade, create_time AS createTime, update_time AS updateTime, commodity_status AS commodityStatus from b_commodity where 1=1
and commodity_name like CONCAT('%',#{name},'%'))
and (create_time between CONCAT(#{beginTime},' 00:00:00') and CONCAT(#{endTime},' 23:59:59'))
mapper.update: update b_commodity set commodity_status = #{status},update_time = now() where commodity_id = #{commodityId}
mapper.select: select commodity_id AS commodityId, commodity_name AS commodityName, commodity_img AS commodityImg, grade AS grade, commodity_status AS commodityStatus, #{floorId} AS floorId from b_commodity where commodity_status = 'PUTAWAY'

SELECT COUNT(a.goodId) AS number, a.createTime AS date FROM ( SELECT good_id goodId, SUBSTR(create_time,1,10) createTime FROM b_order WHERE b_status = 5) AS a GROUP BY a.createTime ORDER BY a.createTime DESC LIMIT 10

SELECT b.commodity_name AS name, a.value FROM (SELECT good_id, COUNT(b_id) AS value FROM b_order WHERE b_status = 5 and good_id is not null GROUP BY good_id ) AS a LEFT JOIN b_commodity b ON a.good_id = b.commodity_id
SELECT SUBSTR(create_time, 1, 10) AS date, COUNT(b_id) AS number FROM b_order GROUP BY date ORDER BY date
